Question: Specialty Coating Systems CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Specialty Coating Systems

SCS Dip Coating Systems

 - Liquid coating for printed circuit boards in production or lab settings
 - Compatible with urethane, epoxy, silicone, acrylic coatings, photoresists, and solder mask materials
 - Ultra-thin coatings ranging from 50nm to 3µm
 - Halogen-free and sustainable
 - Biocompatibility per ISO 10993-5
 - Non-hypersensitivity per ISO 10993-10
 - RoHS & REACH compliance
 - Abrasion resistance
 - PlasmaGuard coatings applied via plasma-enhanced chemical vapor deposition (PECVD) under vacuum
Summary_cn:
专业涂层系统

SCS浸涂系统

- 适用于生产或实验环境下的印制电路板的液体涂覆
- 兼容尿素酯、环氧、硅橡胶、丙烯酸涂层、光刻胶和焊接阻焊材料
- 超薄涂层厚度范围为50纳米至3微米
- 无卤素并具有可持续性
- 符合ISO 10993-5的生物相容性标准
- 符合ISO 10993-10的非过敏性要求
- 符合RoHS和REACH法规
- 具有抗磨损性能
- PlasmaGuard涂层通过真空下的等离子增强化学气相沉积（PECVD）应用
